title: [The Toadwort, Blackened Morass]
description: Smoke rises in thick, choking vines from the depth of a hollow cavity in the ground.  A stench like that of sulfur and burning flesh punishes the air.  A narrow thread of land spirals downward into the pit.  Huge shiny pieces of ore are embedded into its walls and are illuminated by a particularly bright moonbeam.  The ground surrounding the pit is dry and sandy and completely devoid of life.

A narrow thread of land spirals downward into the pit, and huge shiny pieces of ore are embedded into its walls.  The ground surrounding the pit is dry and sandy and completely devoid of life.
